verbose_text: AGR2 plasmid transfection significantly inhibited the decrease in TEER as well as the increase in FD-40 flux induced by TNF-alpha (XREF_FIG), indicating that AGR2 ameliorated the TNF-alpha-induced increase in permeability of the model system.
evidence: AGR2 plasmid transfection significantly inhibited the decrease in TEER as well as the increase in FD-40 flux
